Content:
Imagine you drop off motorcycle at a bike shop to have a little work done and when you call about it you find it was stolen by a gunman who walked into the MC shop, started shooting, went outside and shot at other people and then stole your motorcycle on his way out.

I've been to this little shop before on the north side of Marietta, Georgia.
It was open on a Monday which surprised me. The guy there was very helpful to take a quick look at my bike and give me some advice about what it needed.

Title: meth head shoots up bike shop
Author: gunsmoker
